title: Anyone know anything about riot coding?
body:
So I was wondering if anyone knows enough about Riot's coding because I just recently found a strategy to break losing streaks which seems solid. Normally when I have a bad game or start having a losing streak I'll smash out some bots games just to get some wins on the board which some what helps but not enough.  Then yesterday I met a guy on boards who is a little bit less experienced than me and still learning more advanced concepts of the game. I suggested to him we go play some 1v1 and practice drills just to help him out. After having 3-4 drill games every game I've played since we have snow balled 20 minute games. 
It's been a few weeks since I have won more than 2 games in a row let alone snow balled games. So my theory is that when you have a bad game and get severely out traded that something in the coding is taken into account for future games until you do the same to someone else. Maybe it's just me and no one else has experienced this but it's not the first time it's happened to me so I was just curious if anyone knows anything about it?
